languages.text: То была жестокая и кровавая схватка. Даже сил свиты Лорд-капитана оказалось недостаточно, чтобы пробить несокрушимую броню Крика скверны.
The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.
languages.original_text: То была жестокая и кровавая схватка. Даже сил свиты Лорд-капитана оказалось недостаточно, чтобы пробить несокрушимую броню Крика скверны.

traits.locale_text: The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Balescream's indestructible armour.
The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Balescream's indestructible armour.
The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Balescream's indestructible armour.
The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Balescream's indestructible armour.
The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.
The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.

languages.text: 那场战斗惨烈而血腥，即便是舰长大人的随行人员，也无法刺穿灾啸坚不可摧的护甲。
languages.original_text: The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.

traits.locale_text: 那场战斗惨烈而血腥，即便是舰长大人的随行人员，也无法刺穿灾啸坚不可摧的护甲。

languages.text: L'entourage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} a mené un combat éreintant et sanglant, mais n'a rien pu faire pour perforer l'armure indestructible du Fléau Hurlant.
languages.original_text: The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.

traits.locale_text: L'entourage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} a mené un combat éreintant et sanglant, mais n'a rien pu faire pour perforer l'armure indestructible du Fléau Hurlant.

languages.text: 戦いは過酷で血生臭いものだった。ロード・キャプテンの従者でさえドゥームスクリームの不滅の鎧を貫くことはできなかった。
languages.original_text: The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.

traits.locale_text: 戦いは過酷で血生臭いものだった。ロード・キャプテンの従者でさえドゥームスクリームの不滅の鎧を貫くことはできなかった。

languages.text: La batalla fue brutal y sangrienta. Ni siquiera el séquito de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán podía atravesar la indestructible armadura de Doomscream.
languages.original_text: The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.

traits.locale_text: La batalla fue brutal y sangrienta. Ni siquiera el séquito de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán podía atravesar la indestructible armadura de Balescream.

languages.text: Der Kampf war grausam und blutig. Selbst das Gefolge des Lord Captains konnte Unheilsschreis unzerstörbare Rüstung nicht durchbohren.
languages.original_text: The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.

traits.locale_text: Der Kampf war grausam und blutig. Selbst das Gefolge des Lord Captains konnte Unheilsschreis unzerstörbare Rüstung nicht durchbohren.

languages.text: Savaş meşakkatli olduğu kadar kanlıydı da. Lord Kaptan'ın maiyeti dahi Belanarası'nın yok edilemez zırhını delmeyi başaramamıştı.
languages.original_text: The fight was gruelling and bloody. Even the Lord Captain's retinue could not pierce Doomscream's indestructible armour.
